basics.name: Sebastian Rojo Suarez
basics.label: Open-Source Machine Learning Engineer, Co-Founder at ArtisanLabs  •  Senior Kubernetes Engineer • Edge Computing • Full Stack Dev • Remote work • Startups • COSS • SaaS
basics.summary:
Hi, I'm Sebastian Rojo Founder at ArtisanLabs, ex-CTO and co-founder at RisePal, ex-CTO, former owner of Sapian, and founder of startup WunderComm. I'm part of Linux/Open Source revolutions. According to my ability and scope, I was an active player in my city's free software and Linux revolution. Now Linux and open source is state of the art in our technology World. For 15 years, I have created a team that believes in the freedom offered by new technologies, with which we have democratized simple solutions that empower hundreds of companies.

I am passionate about evaluating new open-source technologies. As a result, I can quickly implement, integrate, and interoperate nascent technologies to assess their disruptive capacity and challenge the technological status quo. 

After 13 years of applying active learning and learning strategies, I have become a generalist CTO with many initiatives, always thinking about Innovation using analytical thinking, complex problem-solving, creativity, and originality.

work.name: ArtisanLabs
work.summary: As a co-founder and CTO of ArtisanLabs, I am leading the development of innovative solutions that leverage Generative AI and Real-Time Communication technologies to revolutionize workplace communication. Our mission is to become 'the Slack for the rest of the world,' addressing the significant gap in real-time communication and leadership tools for the majority of the global workforce. We are focusing on deep product development and fostering deep relationships with users and customers, crucial in the era of generative AI and AGI startups. We are exploring lucrative opportunities in sectors with deskless workforces, such as a CRM-connected Executive Assistant for pharma deskless sales forces and an AI-powered Executive Assistant for General Managers in large workforce operations. Our overarching goal is to become the preferred operating system for large workforces globally.
highlights: Leveraging Generative AI and Langchain to enable complex reasoning and interactions at a fraction of traditional costs, achieving a 150x reduction in costs compared to average coaching expenses.

Prioritizing voice-enabled real-time conversations, rooted in the belief that verbal communication is the most effective method for learning and teaching, aligning with human evolutionary development.

Focusing on deep product development (specialization) using technologies like Next.js, Node, Javascript, Python, FastAPI, Supabase, and pgvector, and fostering deep relationships with users and customers, crucial in the era of generative AI startups.

work.name: WunderComm
highlights: WunderComm is a conversation CRM that integrates Matrix, WhatsApp, and AI.
Designed for easy implementation, particularly beneficial for small businesses.
work.summary:
◾ CEO

Define the desired culture and cultivate it through leadership actions, including setting objectives, strategies, and critical results that prioritize culture-building and designing the organization and its operational processes to support and advance the company's purpose and core values.

Responsible for talent acquisition strategy, especially for C-suite candidates Attracting and recruiting leadership talent, and Sustaining a healthy and productive workplace.

◾ CTO
Translate business strategy into an architecture, technology, and roadmap; responsible for building and managing the engineering team, Directly contributing to making the product.

work.name: RisePal
work.summary: As CTO of RisePal, I led the development of Arouse, an AI assistant that transformed the way professionals interacted with opportunities in the tech market. However, the advent of OpenAI's GPTs and Assistants API Beta led to a reevaluation of our approach, as these tools allowed us to replicate months of intensive development in minutes. This experience sparked deep reflections on the value of human work in the era of rapid technological progress and the balance between efficiency and transparency in innovation. Additionally, I was responsible for the deployment and design of the entire infrastructure of RisePal using Kubernetes, GCP, Terraform, FastAPI, and Traefik.
highlights: Developed Arouse, an AI assistant, using advanced AI and machine learning technologies such as Langchain and PgVector.
Utilized Nuxt.js for frontend design, creating an intuitive user interface for Arouse.
Deployed and designed the entire infrastructure of RisePal using Kubernetes, GCP, Terraform, FastAPI, and Traefik.

work.name: Sapian S.A.S
highlights: Led a technical team in the design, development, and scaling of an open-source product for real-time communication, resulting in a 374K USD increase in Annual Recurring Revenue
Established and executed a strategic technology roadmap, leading to the on-time delivery of key projects, exceeding organizational goals by 20%

Spearheaded the development and implementation of RTC Solutions, a pioneering hybrid cloud-based call center and corporate voice solution. This enhancement reduced latency by 30% and increased speed, leading to improved customer satisfaction
work.summary: As the leader of Service Design and Experience, I am a dedicated Design Thinker. My achievements include assembling a technical team that collaboratively designed, developed, and scaled a company. Our focus on open-source products for real-time communication led to an impressive increase of 374K USD in Annual Recurring Revenue.

references.name: Alberto Llamas
references.reference:
I had the pleasure of working with Sebastian for two years at Sapian, during which time he proved himself to be an excellent leader and manager.

Sebastian is a highly intelligent and strategic thinker, who is always able to come up with creative solutions to problems. He is also an excellent communicator and motivator.

In addition to his managerial skills, Sebastian is also an expert in his field. He is constantly keeping up with the latest trends and developments, and is always able to provide valuable insights and perspectives.

I am confident that Sebastian would be an excellent asset to any organization, and I wholeheartedly recommend him for any position he may be interested in.

projects.name: JOE J.A.R.V.I.S (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) Online Edition
projects.summary:
Joe is a voice assistant designed to democratize this technology.

◼️ How do we democratize Voice Assistant technology?

We believe that we can make this technology more accessible by allowing technologically obsolete communication systems to access the assistant. The Key to the Issue is that Joe is decoupled from the manufacturers' development APIS. JOE is simply a SIP User Agent that interacts with the customer via Voice and DTMF tones. Imagine it with an additional Phone or an additional Endpoint.

In Sapian we have a lot of experience developing rich Voice experiences using the development interfaces of Asterisk, Freesiwtch, Twillio among others... But each application requires upgrades (for example to have ARI or AudioSockets). With this we want to reach more places with this technology avoiding this kind of technological barriers.

It is evident that JOE can also work in the latest technology environments, in fact in these environments it scales much better.

projects.name: slack2matrix Migration
projects.summary:
Migrates Users, Channels and all the conversations from a Slack export to Matrix Warning: It’s not recommended to use anything but a fresh/empty Synapse instance for migration

However, you can configure it to import the Slack workspace to an empty federated server and use that to effectively migrate rooms to an existing Matrix server via federation. See ‘Federated setup (import to an existing Matrix server)’ below.
